content: Hug the path to the left and continue along the lava, until you reach another tree to harvest a Fire Date and a statue on the right. Take the slope up and pick up the green Wisp from underneath the bridge directly opposite.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Hug the path to the left and continue along the lava, until you reach another tree to harvest a Fire Date and a statue on the right. Take the slope up and pick up the green Wisp from underneath the bridge directly opposite.
